Html:
Hi Guys,

Do you plan on releasing an update in the near future?

Thanks for the update.

Cheers!
I'll leave this to Kazi. However an update to Source Control is frequently. I recenlty I submitted a major changeset that is preview of KiGG - 2.5. Check it out.

I am waiting for the localization phase that Kazi promised for V3
Can we have an idea when this planned for?

By the way, congratulations for your efforts.
You've done a really great job.

Thanks
